title: How John Oliver can save Sargon
description:
Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/SeanFitzgerald
Donate to support me: www.PayPal.me/iamsean90
Twitter @Iamsean90 @AJWSean
Second Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DudeMonkeyHQ

In this video I discuss the nonsense lawsuit that "youtuber" Akilah Obviously, has brought against youtuber Sargon of Akkad. This is clearly a desperate attempt to cash in on her failing regressive youtube channel. However, in this video I explain why I think Sargon has a decent shot at winning if he decides not to settle. Essentially Sargon's video legally speaking should be seen like John Oliver's and Now this segment, which is something that is a part of his overall show but can exist as a satire separate from the whole episode. The Oliver segment like Sargon's video is a series of edited clips meant to match the title. In my opinion Sargon can & will win this case if he opts to defend himself strengthening Fair use protections for all.

Sources:
Akilah's terrible explanation video:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vd16eGCocRE&feature=youtu.be

John Oliver Segment Referenced: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EjpJqcM3X94&t=1s
